quote: And the worst thing was, there were no mirrors out there in the wild, so the princess was left wondering whether she in fact was still beautiful... or if the fall had changed the story completely.
quote_letters: AND THE WORST THING WAS THERE WERE NO MIRRORS OUT THERE IN THE WILD SO THE PRINCESS WAS LEFT WONDERING WHETHER SHE IN FACT WAS STILL BEAUTIFUL OR IF THE FALL HAD CHANGED THE STORY COMPLETELY

chat:
shutout: A scoreless game for the pitcher.
clutch: Power booster for high performance.
open-air: Without a roof or a cover.
thyroid: Butterfly-shaped gland near the neck.
twelfth: Ordinal number indicating a place in a series.
warmth: A pleasant sensation of heat.
effect: A result or consequence of something.
stewart: Scottish surname meaning steward or guardian.
twinned: Paired or closely connected.
errors: Mistakes or inaccuracies.
rhythms: Repeating patterns of sounds or movements.
fellow: A man or boy.
entire: Whole or complete, without exception.
lineages: Series of ancestors or descendants.
delaware: American state in the East Coast.
phones: Devices used to communicate with others.
rebels: People who resist or defy authority.
enlisted: Enrolled in the military or a similar organization.
towing: Pulling or hauling something behind.
throws: Actions of launching or projecting something.
isaiah: Hebrew prophet and author of a book in the Old Testament.
eighth: Ordinal number indicating a place in a series.
second-half: The latter part of a game or competition.
